futforall.urls module¶

futforall.views module¶

This module contains functions for rendering the home page and getting the count of unread notifications.

index::

The index function renders the home page and passes a context dictionary containing the list of Match objects and the count of unread notifications.

param request:

The HTTP request object.

type request:

HttpRequest

return:

The HTTP response object containing the rendered index.html template with the context dictionary.

rtype:

HttpResponse

count_unread_notifications::

This function returns the count of unread notifications for the authenticated user.

param request:

The HTTP request object.

type request:

HttpRequest

return:

The count of unread notifications.

rtype:

int

futforall.views.count_unread_notifications(request)[source]¶

Returns the count of unread notifications for the authenticated user.

Parameters:

request (HttpRequest) – The HTTP request object.

Returns:

The count of unread notifications.

Return type:

int

futforall.views.index(request)[source]¶

View for rendering the home page.

Context

match_list

List of all matches in the database, ordered by the created date.

unread_notifications_count

The count of unread notifications for the current user.

Template

Parameters:

request (HttpRequest) – The HTTP request object.

Returns:

The HTTP response object containing the rendered index.html template with the context dictionary.

Return type:

HttpResponse
